CustomField.description:
CPC First Response Time (Based on GNO's Logic to push to business Hour). Assumption 12 hours working (8-8), and the day starts from 8 AM ET (12:00 GMT)
Not accurate if the 1st reply email is an Auto Reply (Workcenter for example).
CustomField.formula: ROUND(12 * ( (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE( First_Response_Time__c ) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE( First_Response_Time__c ) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 12 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE( First_Response_Time__c )) >= 12, First_Response_Time__c , DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE( First_Response_Time__c )) + " " + '12:00:00' )) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 12:00:00'), 1 ))) )) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 12 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate)) >= 12, CreatedDate, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) + " " + '12:00:00' )) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 12:00:00'), 1 ))) )) ), 2)
CustomField.label: Time to First Response (CPC)
